## Introduction
Hello! My name is Siyan( Wendy) Wen. I came from Beijing, China. I am currently a biostatistics MS student at Columbia University, Mailman School of Public Health. Before that, I studied applied mathematics( BS) and biological sciences at University of Connecticut. I started studied fMRI research in 2022 Summers. Now, I am interested in field of brain imaging research, data analysis, data visualization, etc.
